## Impact

<!-- Describe the impact this issue has on your use of the application -->

- [ ] Blocker: Prevents core functionality from working
- [ ] Critical: Severely impacts primary workflows
- [ ] Major: Impacts important functionality but has workarounds
- [ ] Minor: Causes inconvenience but doesn't prevent any functionality
- [ ] Trivial: Cosmetic or very minor issue
